comments.body: Above, you wrote that `ov_eligible` is returned when `success and I(domain_status) is C(APPROVED), C(RE_VERIFICATION) or C(EXPIRING).`. But here, you only return it if it has value `True`.

That was a mistake, I meant to always return it if the domain _could_ be eligible. Changed it to always return if the value is set (the API happens to always return a value if state is approved/re_verification/expiring/expired).
